@@20948606 @948606/ <h> Learn More About spoonfulofcomfort.com <p> We all need comfort and support at times of distress , anguish , and pain . Be it from family , close friends , colleagues , and even complete strangers , just to make us feel better and carry on with our day and persevere against all challenges great and small . These emotions take their toll and sometimes it means you just need food to nourish yourself and feel good again . Everyone likes food after all and sometimes emotions make us hungry too . In times of personal tragedy or turmoil , food can be a great way of support . Whether someone is battling an ailment , feeling blue over something at work , or just sad about something , just send over a bowl of soup to cheer them up and make them smile through Spoonful of Comfort ! <p> Our journey begins in October 2007 . Marti Wymer is told the shocking news of her mother is battling cancer back in their native New Brunswick , Canada while Marti was a working mother in Florida . The long @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ those vital moments and Marti thought of sending her mom some chicken soup to make her feel better . After finding the ideal recipe , Marti was notified that her mom passed away . Within six weeks of being first told of the cancer and before she could even try her daughter 's soup . Despite the personal tragedy , Marti vowed never to let anyone in pain and anguish be denied the chance to have some comforting soup in their hour of need and founded our company . Today , we send personalised gift baskets with our soulful chicken soup across the US for any reason or occasion . <p> Our gift basket comes in a proper , insulated box that contains a 64-oz jar of one of three soups ( chicken noodle , potato leek , tomato basil ) fit for 4-6 generous servings , half dozen cookies ( chocolate chip , oatmeal raisin , sugar , or none ) , half dozen bacci rolls , a serving ladle , a hand-written note card , and colourful custom packaging to fit the mood ( thinking of you , @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ home , and corporate gift ) . All our food items are homemade for that personal touch . Each gift basket starts at $69.99 and is hand delivered through express services to anyone 's doorstep within 1-3 business days of any order . The food items must be refrigerated and consumed within 2-3 days or frozen for later use . An order may only be cancelled up to the time that it ships . After the order ships , the order may no longer be cancelled . <p> Just register a free account on our website , select the relevant items on your soup gift basket , place your order , and pay for it safely and securely through any major credit card . We also value our customers immensely and are always here to help in whatever way we can regarding our goods and services . Initially , it was a huge mansion that was constructed in the year 1348 and was made as a simple countryside place that was originally named Chessington Lodge . But later between the period1642 and 1660 , the civil war was on , and the original and initial building was then changed to a cavalier . It was then subjected to fire by the very famous Cromwell 's forces of that time . After a long gap , it was built again and then named as Burnt Stub @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ to be used as an alehouse . In the year 1900 , the estate was transferred to the ownership of Vere Barker family and in the initial days of the twentieth century , it was again subjected to fire and then , was brought back to its shape in the year 1919 . In the year 1931 , an enthusiast of animals Reginald started a new place called Chessington Zoo that allowed the local people to see and go through the huge collection of the animals . Originally the Royal Alexandria Theatre , one of the oldest North American theatres , Ed Mirvish bought the property in 1963 and saved it from demolition . It functioned as a --road house-- , allowing short runs of shows from both New York and London to come through , and renting to local theatre companies , and now sits at the heart of the entertainment center of Toronto , arguably starting the whole area . With 2300 seats , the Mirvish is now Toronto 's largest commercial theatre production company . Do be aware that if you purchase the tickets on the website , they are subject to service fees , whereas if you go and buy tickets at the Mirvish box office or one of its sister theatres , you will not have to pay said fees . ... @@20948748 @948748/ <h> Learn More About guildwars2.com <p> Guild Wars 2 is the sequel to the Guild Wars series of games by ArenaNet . Guild Wars 2 was released on August 28 , 2012 . It has been in development since 2006 . Many features have integrated into the game which aligns it with traditional MMORPGs , such as a persistent world and a level cap of 80 , but the game has been described by ArenaNet as having non-traditional elements as well , because " it does n't make you spend hours preparing to have fun rather than just having fun . " <p> The company with all its perks and benefits is one of the best providers of educational material out there and their online store is a pleasure to shop at . <p> Guild Wars 2 began development in the middle of 2006 ; it was first announced to the public in 2007 . It began closed beta testing on 16 December 2011 . On 23 January 2012 , ArenaNet announced that Guild Wars 2 would launch by the end of that year , following beta tests throughout @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ that the game would launch on 28 August 2012 . ArenaNet began offering playable demos to convention attendees starting with Gamescom in 2010 . In each of these demos the game systems presented to players have increased and shown evolution and change Pre-purchase for Guild Wars 2 started on April 10th , 2012 allowing players to purchase one of three versions of the game before its launch : Digital Edition , Digital Deluxe Edition , and Collector 's Edition . <p> There are currently four versions of the game available : <p> -+ Boxed ( only through retailers ) <p> -+ Heroic edition , offering full-featured copy of the game including several bonus items . <p> -+ Deluxe , which includes special in-game features : a miniature , several one-time or short-term use items , and a special elite skill . <p> -+ Collector 's Edition , a disc-version of the above , which also comes a 10-inch Rytlock figurine , 112 page Making of Guild Wars 2 book , Best of Guild Wars 2 Soundtrack CD , art portfolio and five art prints , and a custom art frame @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ some retailers still have this in stock ) <p> Combat in Guild Wars 2 is built around three facets : damage , control and support . Damage is simply decreasing the enemy 's health , control is preventing the enemy from doing what it wants , and support consists of working together with allies . Each profession is able to perform any of these roles . While some professions may be better at an aspect than others , no character is a specialist in a particular role . For example , there is no profession which focuses on the healing aspect of support - the best healing abilities available in the game are the compulsory self-healing skills . <p> Combat is designed to be tactical ; items in the environment can be used as weapons , body position can affect skills , and skills which allies use can interact with the player to create new effects . Even what is done at the edge of death can change the outcome of the fight dramatically . <p> When acquiring the game through the official website there is a " Play for @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ no monetary cost . @@20948786 @948786/ <h> Learn More About zoosk.com <p> As one of the most widely visited sites in the world relating to online dating scene , Zoosk has become increasingly popular and offers a chance for single ladies and gents to pick out a partner that best suits their needs , habits and requirements . With apps like Tinder in the market , one would expect that others would stay well away from this circuit , but Zoosk has been carving a niche for itself since 2007 when it 's two co-founders Shayan Zadeh and Alex Mehr launched the company in December of that year , whilst initially studying in the Sharif University of Technology in Iran and later the duo continued to study together in the US at the University of Maryland . Zadeh worked with tech giant Microsoft after graduating with a master 's degree while his friend did the same at NASA , but both later turned their sole focus onto Zoosk , which started growing by then . <p> Since its inception , the firm experienced high growth and was in a strong position by 2014 but needed @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ scale their operations which were lacking severely at that point . Subsequently , they filed S-1 paperwork for their IPO in April and aimed to raise over $100 million in capital that would help they achieve their target . Before offering their targeted amount , which was substantial to say the least , the firm had revenues of $178.2 million , a 63% increase over the previous year , in 2013 and had extremely impressive statistics that showed how much potential they held in an extremely competitive market that is dominated by the industry leaders and fuelled by consistent innovation ; 27 million members , 3 of which 650,000 were paying subscribers and had a growth rate of 44% year-over-year when it came to their membership . Eventually , such was their market that ruled the roost and became the top grossing application on the Apple iOS store . <p> Although they had over $200 million in sales in 2014 , they were still losing money at an alarming rate and they needed to identify core issues that were threatening to derail the entire project . As it turned out @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ hiring , which drained resources immensely and affected their profits significantly . A major chunk of this was down to the startup philosophy that profits do not matter ; a theory which makes it extremely difficult to survive in the long-run as a firm will not succeed if does not make money . Zoosk lay off staff to cut costs and implemented a paid membership deal . <p> Zoosk primarily works as an application that client support for PC , iOS and Android devices . The company uses big data and algorithmic recommendations technology in order to help its users find relevant partners that they can use . The basic principle is that the more data that Zoosk gets it from its users , the better it can help find them a match . <p> A photo verification service was added to the platform in August , 2014 that was designed to prevent unwanted manipulation and ensure that all users present on the site were relevant , confirmed individuals whose identity and current look could be properly checked as such . <p> Zoosk now currently stands a market leader with @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ a very good run for their money . <h> zoosk.com Social Media <p> Facebook is globally the largest social media platform and engages fans unlike any other . Games on Roblox can be scripted using a sandboxed edition of Lua 5.1 to affect events that occur in-game and create different scenarios . In all its huge 140 years of service span ( and still counting ) , the company has been at the forefront , taking care of all the textbook needs of students , making it easier for both teachers and students . The company as Follet Corporation was founded in 1873 by Charles M. Barnes when he opened a bookstore at his home in Illinois . The company was renamed Follett Corporation by the sons of CW Follet in 1957 , who was initially a shareholder of the company and later purchased it in 1923 . The website was launched in 1999 . @@20948804 @948804/ <h> Learn More About worldoftanks.com <p> The World of Tanks is a multiplayer online game which can be played in a team and is dedicated to the mid-20th-century era fighting vehicles . The game allows you to throw yourself into epic tank battles with other steel cowboys to rule the world with tank supremacy . The game is developed by Belarusian-Cypriot company Wargaming . The game could be played for free , but could be enhanced to a premium level for a fee also . The focus remains on one player vs. one player ' , each having the control on his/her armored vehicle . The vehicles for the game could vary from a light , medium or heavy tank , to a tank destroyer , or a self-propelled gun on which the player has complete control . The World of Tanks was introduced as an eSports game at the World Cyber Games 2012 and since then , it is being played worldwide with much passion and love . The game was witnessed at the Xbox Live Arcade on 12 February 2014 for the players of Window version . @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ was released in 2016 . The recent innovation has also been made in the field of mobile phones as the players could now have an access to the same on their personal mobile phones which offers the freedom of convenience . The procedure to play the game is really simple . It initiates with one player who takes the control of a single armored vehicle , and is placed into a battle on a random destination on a map . The player can easily control the vehicle 's movement and fire . Also , the player can talk with other team 's players through chat ( typed or voice ) , along with many preset actions that work as clues and are visible to their team only . Both the players play their role and a match is decided to be won in the situations when either all the vehicles of the opposite team are destroyed or in the situations , when the opposite team 's base is captured in some game modes . The World of Tanks comprises of multiple game mechanics like camouflage , shell ricochets , and @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ makes them try the newness . <p> There are 6 kinds of battle modes in the World of Tanks which are named as random battles , team-training battles , tank company battles , team battles , stronghold battles and special battles . There were also some former playing modes like " Historical Battle " and " Rampage " which are no more used as for the poor reception after the release . In the game of Random Battles , players are even allowed to participate in platoons , in groups of two or three in the same match . Apart from this , there are also missions for completion in the Random Battles , and once the mission is completed , the player receives rewards like credits , higher crew experience coefficients , and new vehicles . The vehicles that are used in the games of the World of Tanks include both armor and cover , and comprise of 390 armored vehicles from many countries . The vehicles are crafted in 3D designings along with intrinsic details towards visual accuracy along with easy game controls for a better gameplay . @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ the Global Map . The rules of the Clan are detailed on the website so as to offer a better understanding to the player . @@20948820 @948820/ <h> Learn More About cedarpoint.com <p> Finding an amazing and adventurous spot for all ages can be difficult . There are many theme parks that promise to provide an entertaining day , but often fail in their delivery . For those that want to spend a day with family and friends enjoying the adrenaline rushes that a real amusement park has to offer should look no further than Cedar Point . With hundreds of different rides and attractions , constant reinvention and a belief that a day at a park should be a magical experience for all , it is setting the bar " or the coaster " high for all other enterprises in this category . Cedar Point is located on a nearly four-hundred acre lot in Sandusky , Ohio . Jutting off of a small peninsula in Ohio , this park has an amazing scenic view . Located near metropolitan areas , this beautiful theme park sits near the waters of Lake Erie and makes the park as beautiful as it is fun . With quality rides and a belief in a family atmosphere , Cedar Point @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ hours and through events and special promotions off season . Founded in 1870 , Cedar Point is a beautifully historic park that has glimpses of rides and fun from year 's past woven into the fabric of its layout . This history coupled with modernity is why it has remained such a popular location for those residents of Ohio and from areas far away . Cedar Point has been in business for so long and provided such a quality of experience through the years that it has been afforded many awards . They are the only location in the world that have extremely high roller coasters in the number that they do . Currently , the park has four operating coasters that stand more than two-hundred feet in the air at their tallest peak , with more being added . <p> Further , they are an award recipient of the Best Amusement Park in the World from the coveted Amusement Today magazine and have earned this recognition sixteen years and running . Because of the history , too , there are several different historic sites located on the premises , @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ Historic Places , highlighting the aforementioned combination of modern day entertainment with the beauty of the past . The park is home to several different shows each year , some musical , some magical , and others mysterious . They have numerous different roller coasters and several children 's rides that are geared to the littlest of riders . They are not a stagnant establishment , however . Cedar Point is constantly reinventing itself and what it offers their fans in the way of entertainment . New to the lineup most recently is the Valravn . Amazingly and impressively , the Valravn is a rollercoaster that can boast some of the most amazing features in the world . The coaster stands an amazing thirty-four hundred feet in the air at its tallest point and likens itself to a bird , swooping and darting through the air with an aviary feel . This addition will officially be open in 2016 but is already gaining recognition and respect . As it stands above beautiful Lake Erie , the Valravn is going to enthrall audiences and riders with its death defying drops , @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ for those who want an adrenaline rush . Tickets can be purchased online or at the front gate of the park , depending on what is most convenient for the consumer . Further , for those that are looking for lower costs , the park offers group rates and special promotions throughout the year . Those that are looking to attend the park are encouraged to call the main office to learn more or seek out information on their readable , user-friendly website. <h> cedarpoint.com Social Media <p> Cedar Point has a legion of fans throughout the world . @@20948887 @948887/ <h> Expired DMCA Promo Codes <h> Learn More About dmca.com <p> Globally , the concept of digital rights management and protection has taken on a number of features over the years and allows for complete , total management of preserving online content that can be subjected to unlawful use without consent . This epidemic continues to plague the third world countries , where the concept of piracy does not exist and most people are content with ripping others off without sourcing or accrediting citations for the content they are using . <p> The Digital Millennium Copyright Act ( DMCA ) in this regard is a superb piece of legislation that was passed by the Clinton administration in 1998 and attempts to two 1996 treaties of the World Intellectual Property Organization ( WIPO ) . It makes the production and unauthorized reproduction of digital content illegal , a measure undertake after the internet boom when content online was not given protection and anyone could be ripped off without a chance to fight things or to move towards a settlement . The law also focuses on several other aspects and criminalizes @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ not there is actual infringement of copyright itself . <p> This law has seen innovation to it 's maximum and allows special exemption from direct and indirect liability for internet service providers and other third party users who may not be in control of the actual rights but are passing them along with their other services through legal means . Allowing for complete control over the rights , the law has done well internationally as well and was adopted by the European Union in the Electronic Commerce Directive 2000 . <p> DMCA.com is the number one online portal used for implementing the law and getting your just reward by having the stealer 's site shut down and the content returned , otherwise known as a take-down in DMCA 's own words . Basically , what happens is that if you are the owner of any digital content and it has been reproduced without your consent , you can have it taken down where it was published . <p> While the site offers you professional services for this type of this situation , they also have specific criteria in place that @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ a specific site . The list of conditions includes : <p> when copyright infringing content is removed or " taken down " from a website , by the website owner , upon receipt of a DMCA Takedown Notice from their ISP / Hosting company . This notice is generated by the , or on behalf of , the illegally published content owner , distributor , publisher etc . <p> 3. when copyright infringing content is removed or " taken down " from a website by the website owner upon receipt of a DMCA Takedown Notice from the , or on behalf of , the content owner , distributor , publisher etc . <p> 4. when copyright infringing content is removed or " taken down " from a website by the by the ISP or Hosting company of the website that is publishing the infringing content . This occurs because the website owner has not voluntarily complied with a DMCA Notice and the ISP or Hosting company must comply with the Takedown notice . <p> 5. when an infringing website is taken down or " offline " by it 's ISP @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ does not voluntarily comply with a Takedown notice as described above . <p> You can visit their site online to file a DMCA takedown or opt for one of their cheaper packages in which you can do the procedure yourself . <h> DMCA website view <p> Plagiarism scanning and watermarking for digital products help prevent online content from being stolen . DMCA works under DMCA Copyright Infringement to make sure stolen content is taken down immediately . They offer both professional level takedowns and do-it-yourself takedowns at reasonable prices . I always wondered how companies paid for this sort of thing to happen , but apparently if your pictures or video or content is being used on another website without your permission , you can get in touch with this company and they will take care of it for you . And if you are a large conglomerate looking to protect your material , or a small business that is really paranoid your things will be stolen , this website is probably for you . All you need to do is add the badge to your website , and your @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ the database , and it will all take less than 2 hours , supposedly . ... More +

@@20948912 @948912/ <h> Learn More About uworld.com <p> UWorld is a Texas based online learning website which is designed to assist US medical students with their licensing exams . The website acts as a resource for the preparation of USMLE exams , board certifications ( ABIM and ABFM ) and nursing exams . The website not only provides updated questions but it also helps students in their learning through its well designed content . The online resource is designed by a team of healthcare professionals in 2000 after their own experience with the lack of resources and difficulty in preparing for license examination . The team creates the online resource center in a bid to provide smart interactive learning resources and practice questions for students that can help them with their studies and exams . The website currently offers to assist with USMLE step 1 , step 2 CK , step 2 CS and Step 3 exams and certificates . Other than USMLE , the online learning resource also helps prepare for ABIM and ABFM board certification along with NCLEX-RN exams for nursing students . Once you are a member , you can attempt as many questions as you want and can also keep track of your scores and overall performance . @@20948942 @948942/ <h> Learn More About londoneye.com <p> London eye is an enormous Ferris wheel located in London , on the South Bank of the river Thames . Ever since 1999 , the year when it was built , London Eye represents a world famous structure featured on countless post cards , art pieces , and many movies and TV series . Also known as the Millennium Wheel , this huge Ferris wheel is 135 meters tall and has a diameter of 120 meters . Ever since January of 2015 it is called Coca-Cola London Eye . <p> At the moment it is the tallest Ferris wheel in Europe and the second highest public viewpoint in London . The inspiration for the London Eye came from the iconic Great Wheel that took more than a 2.5 million passengers for a ride in the period between 1895 and 1906 . London Eye was constructed by a team of architects and engineers which included Frank Anatole , Nic Bailey , Steve Chilton , Malcolm Cook , Mark Sparrowhawk , Julia Barfield and David Marks . The wheel has 32 sealed passenger capsules , @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ 25 people . Seating is provided but not mandatory in these huge , capsules , and many passengers choose to walk around and enjoy the spectacular view from positions up-close to the windows . London Eye needs half an hour to complete a circle , and usually does not stop to admit passengers since it revolves slow enough for people to walk in one of the capsules . It does stop in case of disabled of elderly passengers who need time to get in or get out of the capsules . <p> London Eye offers a large selection of events as well . If you want to enjoy some privacy while circling high above London , you can book a capsule for up to 25 people . Along with the comfort of a private ride you can arrange a variety of champagnes and canapes , wine and finger food or other catering options . Ideal opportunities for this option would be pre-dinner drinks , company team-building event and special occasions with your loved ones , among many others . @@20948999 @948999/ <h> Learn More About uncommongoods.com <p> This is a company that sells creative works . It was the idea of Dave Bolotsky who attended a craft show in Washington D.C back in 1999 . He was inspired by the large numbers of artists who had turned up to display their products and the buyers who had come from many parts of the world . This made him burn with the desire to create a platform where the artists and the buyers could meet up easily . This is how uncommon goods came to existence steered by Co-Founder Thomas Epting who helped it survive some turbulent times . In 2004 , the company started making significant profits and went on a constant rise . Today , it is a team of a hundred all year round employees who are a definition of corporate success . Their main offices are located in Brooklyn New York . Uncommongoods is unique in its own way . @@20949010 @949010/ <h> Expired Burkes Outlet Promo Codes <h> Learn More About burkesoutlet.com <p> Burkes outlets is a privately held business owned by parent company Beall 's , Inc . Rich in tradition , Beall 's , Inc. is one of the biggest companies in the world and holds a number of stores , offering products and services of different categories . Ever since 1915 , the company has operated over 500 stores and holds the status of major employer in state of Florida , where they are also considered as an asset for community services . At Burkes Outlet , customers can find apparel and accessories for the entire family at prices 70% less than that on the market . Most of their stores carry products like shoes , home furnishings , gifts , and toys . Their stores are designed to serve customers of all ages and income levels and they take pride in themselves for offering great assortments at great prices everyday . <p> Burkes Outlet is a product of great learning and experience and series of launches by the parent company ( Beall.INC ) . The company @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ experience and implemented them in what we today know as the Burkes Outlets . The first of the store was opened by Robert M.Beall , SR. , age 22 , which sold dry goods in the small community of Bradentown ( now Bradenton ) , FL. serving a population of just 3000 people . Beall invested his entire savings on the stock and had to use empty wooden boxes as tables for display . The store sold nothing over $1.00 and thus was named the Dollar Limit . With the inflation that followed World War I , prices increased and in 1918 name of the store was changed to the Five Dollar Limit . As the business grew , Beall bought property and built a larger store a few blocks away on Manatee Avenue . The store prospered in the boom 1920s and weathered the hard times that followed . Soon E.R Beall , Robert 's son joined the business after graduating from University of Florida . The father and son took the business forward with the name of Beall 's Department which continued to operate until 1987 when it @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ of the store funded the R.M. Beall , Sr. Foundation which supports youth and education . In 1970 , E.R 's son Robert Beall joined the business after completing a MBA degree from New York University . This was the third generations of Beall 's who had become a household name in market with over $38 million in annual sales . The fourth generation of family service began in 2004 when Bob Beall 's son completed his MBA and joined the organization . The Beall family went a long way to refine and polish their business ideas and strategies with four generations of experience and hard work associated to their name . The idea of Burkes Outlet originated in the early ' 80 's when E. R. Beall became intrigued with the outlet store businesses he saw while vacationing in North Carolina and launched the first outlet in 1987 . The idea was an instant hit and soon the business expanded to 12 outlets in 1992 and further 450 outlets in present . The names Burkes was suggested back in 1998 and has become the front face if Bealls company @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ to their customers with the best since the past 100 years . Their inventory like always is unique and is optimized to fulfill the demand of the masses . With their vast experience in the business they enjoy healthy relations with almost all manufacturers of mass produced products and can negotiate with them to get customers unparalleled discounts and pricing . Their stores have new products coming in daily , providing their customers with a vast variety of choices which never gets redundant . Burkes Outlet has now moved to online sales as well and remaining true to their value shave found great success in it . @@20949081 @949081/ <h> Expired US Wellness Meats Promo Codes <h> Learn More About grasslandbeef.com <p> US Wellness Meats is founded by the John Wood who has been a farmer all his life . It grew out of the realization on the part of John that there can be a unique way of raising the cattle for an evolving niche of the consumers from the US who were then beginning to understand the health benefits of Omega 3S and CLA from the free range meat . John Wood was a fifth generation farmer so he obviously had the requisite thinking and knowledge about the right raising of the animals . This he received in heritage from his neighbors and ancestors . <p> In the nutshell , the archaic method of raising the animals right involved feeding of the animals on the pasture lands . The animals were fed with the grains in confinement for the last four months . These were then sold off to a big animal processor when the time to harvest them had arrived . With the passage of time , John understood that this traditional method might not @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ to 1999 , John altered the method and raised the animals on 100% forage diet . This gave him the proof that he really needed i.e. there indeed was another way to avail the soft and the exquisite tasting lamb , beef , dairy products and bison . <p> So , what was this one thing about the new model that made all the difference ? John fed the animals with the choicest quality forage on the daily basis backed with a rotation grazing sequence . The traditional method is rather inspired from the manner in which the buffalo grazed in North America for several centuries . This was the crucial difference that was seen between the old 1950s model and the 21stcentury grass fed model . <p> In the year 1993 , John along with some of his neighboring farmers went ahead to attend a lecture on the theme of holistic land management . Almost everyone who went there , came back and returned to the old and the usual methods of farming , but not John . He came back , inspired ! He believed that this new @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ the healthier lands and as a result of this , a new method to re-energize the local farming community was on its way ! <p> Accredited to the new and improved methods , the farmers were able to cultivate the richer soil and the biodiversity on their land . This would even help overcome the need for the costly irrigation systems with the use of rainwater alone . John was n't certain whether this theory would translate into practical happening . So , The Wood Family along with the other members of theUS Wellness Meats decided to give this idea a shot . This led to the birth of the US Wellness Meats in the year 2000 . <p> At present , the company is a growing family owned and operated business that is still managed by its founding families . The grass fed beef of theUS Wellness Meats is popular for its incredible taste , health benefits and the quality by the chefs , professional athletes , health experts , and several others . Further , US Wellness Meats has partnered with more like minded small family farms all @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ and include in its offerings free range poultry , grass fed bison and lamb , raw honey , wild caught seafood as well as the other wellness products . <h> grasslandbeef.com Social Media <p> On the Facebook page of the US Wellness Meats you can find a variety of recipes that are shared by the team of the store . @@20949083 @949083/ <h> Learn More About skype.com <p> Skype is an application that gives the user a platform to do video calling as well as voice calling . The user can also listen to the person with whom , he is doing video calling on the skype with the help of a mike . Skype allows the transfer for any type of digital document . It allows transfer of text , audio , video and pictures as well . The roots of skype were planted in the year 2003 by the hands of Niklas Zennstrom and Janus Friis . The thing was made in Denmark . The backend of skype was developed by Ahti Heinla , Priit Kasesalu , and Jaan Tallinn . The initial or former feature with which skype was made was a peer-to-peer and client-server system . Initially , it was named as Skyper . But this word was already associated with some of the domain names . Consequently , they made a drop of r letter from Skyper and consequently the customers got the name which is known at present i.e. Skype . <p> Skype was acquired @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ 2.6 billion . In September of the year 2009 , 65% of Skype was acquired by Silver lake , Canada plan Investment board and Andreessen Horowitz . The deal was done with the cost of $ 1.9 billion and it got released from the hands of eBay . It again got shifted and went in the hands of Microsoft . This was done in the year 2011 in the month of May . <p> It was sold at the cost of $ 8.5 billion . From that time till the present date , it is in the hands of Microsoft . The headquarters of skype are in the city Luxembourg . After this purchase , Microsoft integrated the services of skype with its own products . All the new releases of skype were then handled by Microsoft itself . Skype for modern windows is one of the dedicated client app made by the company . This was in support to windows 8 and can be downloaded easily on windows store after the launch of the new operating system . This was done in the October of the year 2012 . @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ next year and replaced the previous one . This was preinstalled in windows 8.1 or get installed itself after any upgrade was made to windows 8.1 . The latest version of skype got an addition of the business interface with the addition of Lync . The latest version is associated with the combination of the features of Lync and skype software for a normal consumer . It got two interfaces . With this , the organizations got permission to switch to any of the needed interfaces . They can switch easily from the default interface to the business ( Lync ) interface . <p> Skype uses the webcam to enable video calling . Without a webcam , video calling is not possible . Similarly , for voice calling , the user should be having a mic in his computer system . Failing the installation of these two things , the user can not go with video calling as well as voice calling . While Skype charges nothing for skype to skype calling , call to any other mobile network is chargeable. <h> skype.com Social Media <p> It will be much @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ want to but can not due to the distances of miles . It has a height of approximately 800ft which is almost double the height of any other dominant point in the city . From the top you can enjoy captivating views up to 40 miles . Thus you are able to see the entire city form a single point . The View is open throughout the year from morning till evening except on Christmas . The entry to the Shards is by ticket which can be pre-booked giving you price advantage over same day booking price . Though all tickets are dated and timed but once you enter the view point there is no restriction on your time of stay . They also offer Day &amp; Night entry tickets which allow you to visit the shards in the morning to enjoy day tie beauty and again at night to enjoy the city sparkling in @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ breathtaking view of the city from its triple-height viewing platform on level 69 . The Sky Boutique on level 68 is the highest shop in London offering wide range of exclusive souvenirs , guide books and other stuff to explore . @@20949116 @949116/ <h> Expired Abbey 's Bookshops Promo Codes <h> Learn More About abbeys.com.au <p> Abbey 's bookshop was founded in 1968 by Eve and Ron Abbey . The bookshop was founded with the intention of attracting Sydney 's book lovers . The bookshop has since then remained an important site for the politicians , academicians , parliamentarians and authors from different parts of Australia . The founders targeted the large population of Sydney who had a great interest in reading and research . Abbey 's Bookshop was first established in the town of Sydney in 1968 by Ron and Eve Abbey at 115 Pitt Street , but was relocating a year later to the current historic Queen Victoria building in the same town . The bookshop is located in behind the Queen Victoria Building , Abbey 's Bookshop at 131 York Street opposite Sydney 's historic Queen Victoria Building , just fifty meters from the Town Hall . It is situated between two main streets , the York Street and Clarence Street , which make it easy to access from any side of the town . Abbey 's Bookshops comprises @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ one Language Book Centre , all in the same place . The bookshop offers a variety of books with different themes and interests including . Religion , fiction , science , history and governments , politics , geography , economics and business , philosophy , poetry and writings , nutrition and biographies of different personalities . <p> Fantasy and science fiction books are in the Galaxy bookshop while , fiction in other languages are found in Language Book Centre . The Galaxy bookshop was opened in the year nineteen seventy five at the 106a Bathurst Street . It was transferred after ten years to 203b Castlereagh Street which had larger premises . The Galaxy bookshop specializes in the sale of Science , fiction , fantasy and horror books . Later in 1993 , the shop relocated to 222 Clarence Street , which lies behind Abbey 's in the York Street . In the 2002 , the shop moved to 143 York Street , next Abbey 's . In June 2011 Galaxy bookshop moved to a floor above Abbey 's Bookshop , which is the first floor of 131 York Street @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ . The Language Book Centre was later opened in 1976 at 127 York Street . In 1986 it was moved to the first floor of 131 York Street , above Abbey 's , similar to the Galaxy bookshop . There are other shops operated in Sydney by the company . They include Henry Lawson 's Bookshop , Centrepoint Bookshop , City Lights Bookshop , Tank Stream Bookshop , and Budget Bookshop Bargain Bookshop . <p> In nineteen ninety four , both Ron Abbey retired from the business , with Eve Abbey . Jack Winning and Peter Milne remaining as shareholders of the company.A decade laterfollowing the retirement of Jack and Peter which took place in 2008 and 2011 respectively , Eve Abbey , the original co-founder , became the sole shareholder . Eve 's son Alan became the managing director and David Hall was the shop manager . During the weekdays the Abbey 's Bookshop opens business at 8:30 am-6pm , in exception of Thursday which closes at 8 pm . On Saturday the Bookshop is opened from 9am-5pm , while on Sunday and Public Holidays it is open from @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ Australia , and express rates are also available too . Orders , regardless of how many items are ordered are delivered at a charge of $6.50 . Consolidated backorders are sent freight-free , while orders are sent via Australia Post . Items are usually dispatched within 24 hours ( excluding weekends ) and up to 48 hours during the very busy periods . In cases of delays , the bookshop always informs the customer . Standard airmail is used for international orders , provided they are less than 2kg . This show is organized in 28 acre magnificent Tatton Park in Cheshire . It is a great day-out and it 's not only for plant lovers but also for family and friends . @@20949138 @949138/ <h> Learn More About viviennewestwood.com <p> Many designers all around the world strive hard to give the world a piece of their unique creations and leave a mark across the field in their name . Vivienne Westwood is one such designer who has succeeded in creating a following of fans from all across the world , who recognize the brand and the firm for its typically bold and strong toned apparel and accessories . One look at the collection brings an instant reaction of appalled disbelief at first , which is quickly replaced with remarks of awe and amazement at the sheer brilliance of the collections at the firm . One would feel withdrawn at this observation , however , be confident and check out the collections of Vivienne Westwood for yourself and see how this firm makes a bold move of impressing the world with its collections . <p> Vivienne Westwood brings a large collection of apparel and accessory collections for customers from its fashion shows and team of designers who strive hard to create something that stands out of the crowd effortlessly and never fails to draw @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ With its bold and attractive collections the designer has earned enough lauds from the fashion world that gives it the credit to stand apart in the line of designers eagerly awaiting a turn for this fame . <p> Vivienne Westwood offers its collections for both men and women , loyally servicing both genders . While one can shop for a specific collection , browsing for specific products is also an option . Subscribe to the channel to never miss out on any great fashion videos . <h> Vivienne Westwood website view <p> Vivienne Westwood has had a well known design record for over 40 years , beginning with punk rock fashions in the 1970 's . Today Vivienne Westwood brand creates and makes clothing and accessories that appeal to an incredibly broad audience , including young , old , rock and royalty . Each Milan , London and Paris Fashion Weeks , Vivienne Westwood presents at least three fashion shows per season and is considered one of the most inspiring and eclectic brands in the fashion industry .
